<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Horn of Fog](/Equipment.aspx?ID=258)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 573 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 230 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This large ram’s horn perpetually glistens with tiny droplets of water, much like condensation.
